summary: Two actors. One play. Can the differences between the two egocentric men be put aside for the sake of friendship and theatre?
cast: Fabrice Luchini|Lambert Wilson|Maya Sansa|Camille Japy|Ged Marlon|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Annie Mercier|Christine Murillo|Josiane Stoléru|Laurie Bordesoules|Édith Le Merdy|Patrick Bonnel|Philippe du Janerand|Jean-Charles Delaume|Jean-Marc Rousseau|Joël Pyrene|Catherine Rouzeau|Freddy Nail|Olivia Algazi|Julie-Anne Roth|Gilles Treton
keywords: yves montand's song|la rochelle france|moliere|reference to louis jouvet|tour de force
title: Molière en bicicleta
